channel.title: linux on MentosSugus

item.title: Arch Linux下Fcitx5中文输入法失效，显示Not available
item.description: 运行时先是发现boost版本更新了，导致无法启动。直接更新fcitx5即可。 更新fcitx5仍然报错： Failed to load library for addon pinyin on /usr/lib/fcitx5/libpinyin.so. Error: /usr/lib/fcitx5/libpinyin.so: undefined symbol: \_ZNK6libime13PinyinContext21candidatesToCursorSetB5cxx11Ev 参考https://bbs.archlinuxcn.org/viewtopic.php?id=12859 更新libime就好了pacman -S libime
